title.value: Winter soft wheat breeding in Belarus
Селекция озимой мягкой пшеницы в Беларуси

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Semenenko, M.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: The results of winter soft wheat (Triticum aestivum) breeding in Belarus are showed in the article. The basic directions of varieties creation are indicated. Genetic sources by complex of agronomic traits are distinguished. As a result of a long-term work of winter wheat in the conditions of Belarus there was created a set of varieties that combine the positive properties of the complex, which solves the main needs of the republic food self-sufficiency in wheat grain. Primordial role of the initial material in the selection of winter wheat is played by variety Mironovskaya 808. In the conditions of the region genetic plasma of variety Myronovskaia 808 is of the greatest value for breeding. Due to the high combining ability of this unique genotype the selection of winter wheat in the conditions of Belarus meets world standards. The system of varieties solving the problem of the republic self-supply with wheat grain was created and put into production.
